Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface SceneBorderCrossingWatcher

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bounded, DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider, SceneChild
    public interface SceneBorderCrossingWatcher
extends Bounded, SceneChild
    Implement this interface to be notified if the YaegerEntity crosses the boundary of the YaegerScene. In that case, the method notifyBoundaryCrossing(SceneBorder) will be called.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void notifyBoundaryCrossing​(SceneBorder border)
      This method is being called when this SceneBorderCrossingWatcher crosses a border of the YaegerScene.
      default Updatable watchForBoundaryCrossing()  

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.Bounded

        getBottomY, getCenterX, getCenterY, getHeight, getLeftX, getNonTransformedBounds, getRightX, getTopY, getTransformedBounds, getWidth

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.NodeProvider

        getGameNode, toBack, toFront

      • Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.SceneChild

        getSceneHeight, getSceneWidth

    • Method Detail

      • notifyBoundaryCrossing

        void notifyBoundaryCrossing​(SceneBorder border)
        This method is being called when this SceneBorderCrossingWatcher crosses a border of the YaegerScene.
        Parameters:
        border - The border of the YaegerScene the YaegerEntity is crossing.

      • watchForBoundaryCrossing

        default Updatable watchForBoundaryCrossing()
